trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around June 24th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside of my house on my deck with two of my friends. Out of the corner of my eye i noticed something moving across the sky and assumed it was a shooting star. After looking at it directly i realized it was an extremely bright blue circle, and much much bigger than a shooting star would have been. It moved straight across the sky at a steady pace moving faster than an airplane at the same altitude would've been. It's hard describe the size since it was up so high, but from that distance it was about the size of a soccer ball. Up close it would obviously be much bigger. Right when i saw it I knew it was something unusual and started shouting for the other two to look. By the time they turned around it was gone because the opening in the trees that i saw it through isn't very big. It was behind the trees and gone by the time they looked.
